sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useItems } from '../contexts/ItemContext'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { ShoppingBag, ArrowRight, Heart, Users, Leaf, Zap } from 'lucide-react'; const Home = () => { const { items, fetchItems } = useItems(); const { isAuthenticated } = useAuth(); useEffect(() => { fetchItems(); }, [fetchItems]); const recentItems = items.slice(0, 6); const features = [ { icon: , title: "Easy Exchange", description: "Swap your pre-loved clothing with others in the community" }, { icon: , title: "Sustainable Fashion", description: "Reduce environmental impact by giving clothes a second life" }, { icon: , title: "Community Driven", description: "Connect with like-minded fashion enthusiasts" }, { icon: , title: "Eco-Friendly", description: "Contribute to a more sustainable fashion industry" } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Sustainable Fashion Exchange Platform

Join the revolution of conscious fashion. Exchange, discover, and contribute to a sustainable future.

Browse Items {!isAuthenticated && ( Join Now )}
{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose ReWear?

We're making sustainable fashion accessible to everyone through our innovative exchange platform.

{features.map((feature, index) => (
{feature.icon}

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* Recent Items Section */}

Latest Items

Discover the newest additions to our community

{recentItems.length > 0 ? (
{recentItems.map((item) => (
{item.images && item.images[0] ? ( ) : (
)}

{item.title}

{item.condition}

{item.description}

{item.category} {item.size}
View Details
))}
) : (

No items yet

Be the first to add an item to our community!

{isAuthenticated && ( Add Your First Item )}
)} {recentItems.length > 0 && (
View All Items
)}
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Start Your Sustainable Fashion Journey?

Join thousands of users who are already making a difference through conscious fashion choices.

{!isAuthenticated ? ( <> Get Started Sign In ) : ( Add Your First Item )}
); }; export default Home;
